root: ^There’s no way out. You know that, don’t you?
^What are we even doing this for? We both know the sentence we’ve been given.
^You kill me, they undose you, and they’re just going to pair you up with another poor sap tomorrow.
^How many times have I even done this? Twice? Thrice?
^You know what I just realized? I’ll never even remember if I reach fourteen!
^I’ll never even know if I’ve won my freedom!
^Ain’t that one hell of a joke??
